io.anyline.view

Class DocumentScanViewConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.anyline.view.DocumentScanViewConfig

  • public class DocumentScanViewConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to configure the layout and behavior of the Document Scanner View

      • setScanFormat

        public void setScanFormat(DocumentScanViewEnums.ScanRatio scanRatio,
                          boolean scanFormat)
        Set if a ratio / orientation combination should be explicitly passed to the scan engine and if the combination should be exposed in the Select Scan Format dialog.
        Parameters:
        scanRatio - A4, COMPLIMENTSLIP, BUSINESSCARD, LETTER, CUSTOMRATIO
        scanFormat - TRUE, FALSE

      • setUserScanFormat

                              boolean bScanFormat)
        Set if a user checked / unchecked a ratio / orientation combination in the Select Scan Format Dialog; this should be explicitly passed to the scan engine
        Parameters:
        scanRatio - A4, COMPLIMENTSLIP, BUSINESSCARD, LETTER, CUSTOMRATIO
        bScanFormat - TRUE, FALSE
